Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.annotations

Annotation Type StepParameter

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(FIELD)
public @interface StepParameter
    Marks fields of SequentialActionSupplier and SequentialGetStepSupplier those values should be reported as parameters of steps

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element Description
      java.lang.String value
      Defines a name of a step parameter

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      boolean doNotReportNullValues
      Defines whenever to skip or not parameter whose value is null
      java.lang.Class<? extends ParameterValueGetter<?>> makeReadableBy
      Assigns a class that transforms value of a field to a readable parameter of a step.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        java.lang.String value
        Defines a name of a step parameter
        Returns:
        step parameter name

      • doNotReportNullValues

        boolean doNotReportNullValues
        Defines whenever to skip or not parameter whose value is null
        Returns:
        whenever to skip or not parameter whose value is null
        Default:
        false

      • makeReadableBy

        java.lang.Class<? extends ParameterValueGetter<?>> makeReadableBy
        Assigns a class that transforms value of a field to a readable parameter of a step.
        Returns:
        subclass of ParameterValueGetter
        Default:
        ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.parameters.ParameterValueGetter.DefaultParameterValueGetter.class
